Note: For other MSS see 5613; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 2970.
_description: Gospel for the Sunday after the Nativity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
The iewes made ilka ȝereSeuen festez on þair
                    ȝere…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þan euer ȝitt before was heþat be þis
                    tale we maye wele se
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ÞE Iewes made eueriche ȝereSeuene ffestes In heore
                    Manere…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þen euer ȝit bi foren was heAs we may bi a tale I
                    se
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Erant Ioseph & Maria Mater Ihesu mirantes (f.
                    172ra)

Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.

                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Þe iewes made ilk a ȝereSeuen festes on ȝeire
                    manere…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…þen euer ȝit bifore was heÞat may ȝe by
                    þis tale se
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title: Dominica infra Natalis domini secundum Lucam (p. 37)

CULDd11.First Lines:
The iewis made eueri ȝerevij festis on hire
                    manere…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…þan euere ȝet beforn was heas ȝe may be a tale
                    here se
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Erant ioseph & maria mater ihesu mirantes super his que dicebantur
                        de illo et cetera (f. 55v)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
The Iewes made euer ilk yereseuen festes on þair
                    manere…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Than euer ȝit before was heAls we be a taill now may
                    se

HunHM129.First Lines:
Þe iowys mad euerylk ȝereSeuyn festys on þar
                    manere…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þan ȝyt euer be for was heAs ȝe may by
                    þis tald se
